description: This course is perfect for anyone looking to sell and make money on Amazon. You will learn everything you need to know in order to start selling on Amazon. We cover how to set up a store, the 6 things to watch out for, how to upload and manage products, and how to convert a product to be fulfilled by Amazon. We have created 10 simple easy to follow videos ranging from 90 seconds to 10 minutes going into the major areas that will impact how much you sell on Amazon. You will also learn the major variables that make up the Amazon algorithm and the opportunities for you to optimize your product content to win the buy box more often, increase your sessions and take market share from your competitors. We help you compress your timelines and avoid some of the mistakes that we have made of the past 10 years that have cost us hundreds of thousands of dollars and many sleepless nights. Amazon mAde eZ specializes in helping companies streamline their product offering and mitigate risk and exposure when selling and expanding on Amazon; or simply put, "We are the SEO for Amazon"
title: Selling on Amazon - Tips & Strategies to Increase Sales NOW!
